com.brightcove.auth

Class AuthListenerDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.auth.AuthListenerDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthListenerDelegate
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessEnablerCallbackDelegate

    public class AuthListenerDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuthListenerDelegate
    Managing callback listeners and dispatching. The listeners dispatching is done back into the main UI thread
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)

    • Method Detail

      • dispatchEvent

        protected void dispatchEvent(java.lang.String listenerType,
                 IAuthEvent event)
        Starts the dispatching of listener events. Using Handler to process and send back events to the main UI thread
        Parameters:
        listenerType - the listener type to lookup and invoke
        event - the event to pass to the invoked listener methods
        Since:
        1.0
